participant_1.background:
I dress professionally for work and wear comfortable clothes on vacation.
i need to use an inhaler sometimes.
I take my dog for a walk in the park before I head to work at the museum.
i have a lot of allergies.
i work as a veterinarians assistant.

participant_2.background:
I am proud of my ability to find affordable and delicious food at the deli.
I've been enjoying my new hobbies of rock collecting and macaroni art.
i got married when i was young.
i enjoy electronic music.
I got to go on a road trip with my siblings to celebrate my birthday.

content.text: Hello! It's going well, thank you! Just got back from a road trip with my siblings to celebrate my birthday.
Oh that sounds exciting! Where did you go?
We drove out to the coast and spent a few days at the beach. It was really nice to get away.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm glad you had a good time.
Thanks! I'm hoping to do more road trips in the future.
That's great! I love road trips too.
I'm also really into rock collecting and macaroni art.
Oh, that's interesting! I've never really been into either of those things.
I know, they're pretty niche hobbies. But I find them really relaxing.
Thanks! Are you into any hobbies?
I love to cook and bake. I also enjoy going for walks in the park with my dog.
Oh, that sounds nice! I love to cook too.
Great! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! We should do a cooking exchange sometime.
